snippet: Jersey Central Power and Light reported 15,485 customers still without power, excluding the 30,000 customers in coastal areas requiring major rebuilding.
abstract: New Jersey continues its recovery from Hurricane Sandy, but more than 15,000 customers remain without power; status of recovery efforts highlighted in chart.
lead_paragraph: Jersey Central Power and Light reported 15,485 customers still without power, excluding the 30,000 customers in coastal areas requiring major rebuilding.

headline.seo: Updates on Service Restoration in New Jersey
